document.title: Hot Topic: Posting of Charters on Municipal Web Sites Now Required
document.abstract: Public Chapter No. 808 requires each Tennessee municipality and county to post, no later than Jan. 1, 2009, its charter of incorporation on a Web site maintained by the municipality or county.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#162
